title: Awario Starter
text:

Join and win one of the 10 6-month licenses for Awario Starter 
Awario is a search and analysis platform for tracking what's being said about your brand. 
It lets users find all important conversations and join them instantaneously. Awario is the most immediate way to learn about mentions around the Web and social media, including Twitter, Google+, Facebook, YouTube, Q&A sites, blogs, and forums. 
Awarioâ€™s users are business owners and social media managers, leveraging the tool in the following areas of their work: growing their brand awareness
